import React, { useState } from "react"; function Contact() { const [data, setData] = useState({ fullname: '', phone: '', email: '', msg: '', }); const formSubmit = (e) => { e.pre } const inputEvent = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; setData((preVal) => { return { ...preVal, [name] :value, } }) } return( <>

Contact Us

) } export default Contact;
